div.p: Classic control system block diagram with feedback

div.style: text-align: center; margin-top: 3rem; padding: 2rem; background: rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.1); border-radius: 10px;
div.p:
Right-click on your favorite design and save as SVG. Upload to your GitHub repository as favicon.svg and add to your HTML:
<link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="favicon.svg">
